Delta never made Zardus talk, Alloran. Zardus gave that order earlier.

Shomin: Tygerhawk and Iron Raptor are in the middle of the Alliance base (in 
the brig), landing next to them would be very hard (rather impossible).

::Perndabot/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/DevilDuer::

Perndabot smiles at BrightBlade's compliment, the 15 foot tall bot lowering 
his weapon.

"That's when I'm best," he says, reffering to the end of BrightBlade's 
compliment.

He looks her over, his eyes playing over her curves. "You were just going on 
your way, correct? Nothing against the Alliance?"

Reptilica's eyes widen. "Ya mean you're gonna let 'er walk?!" he says to 
Perndabot, rounding at him.

Perndabot looks down at Reptilica, the huge bot dwarfing the other. "As long 
as she's not against us," he says, Reptilica backing off at the tone of 
Perndabot's voice, "You wanna try and stop me?"

Reptilica shakes his head, Bloodystrike, DevilDuer, and himself backing away 
from the towering Perndabot. "Nope, fine with me. Totaly fine," Reptilica 
says nervioustly, not eager to be reduced to a pile of scrap metal.

Perndabot grunts, "Good. For your sake, that is."

He turns back to BrightBlade, "You were going to answer?"
